text: Aap inn kay moamlaat mein khuda ki nazil kerda wahee kay mutabiq hi hukum kijiye inn ki khuwaishon ki tabeydaari na kijiye aur inn say hoshiyaar rahiye kay kahin yeh aap ko Allah kay utaray huye kissi hukum say idhar udhar na keren agar yeh log mun pher len to yaqeen keren kay Allah ka irada yehi hai kay enhen inn kay baaz gunahon ki saza dey hi daalay aur aksar log na farmaan hi hotay hain
